description:
In this course, Russell Dalgleish will teach you how to become an entrepreneur and win new business. Russell enjoys 30 years worth of business experience and in this time he has successfully guided and advised a number of new business start-ups.

ARE YOU THINKING OF STARTING YOUR OWN BUSINESS?

ARE YOU LOOKING FOR A DIFFERENT OUTLOOK?

DO YOU WANT TO WIN NEW CLIENTS?

Then this course is for you.

Russell understands how hard it can be to make that crucial first step. He has been in your position, as have countless of others he has worked with. You need to be Brave, which you undoubtedly can be.

Let Russell help you achieve all you want to achieve.
title: How to Win New Business
